channel.title: APT Repository on
channel.description: Recent content in APT Repository on

item.title: About the Repository
item.description: This is my personal reposistory for things that I package. It’s intended primarily to publish software from other open source projects that otherwise do not package their software at all or in a way I like. I primarily package things for the latest LTS and latest non-LTS versions of Ubuntu, as long as it’s compatible with currently supported Kubernetes versions. Other things may be present in this repository but they may not be actively maintained.

item.title: Adding the Repository
item.description: Manual Installation Update the APT cache and install the prerequisite packages: sudo apt-get update && apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common Add the repository GPG signing key to the APT trust: sudo curl -fsSL https://apt.jameselliott.dev/keyring.gpg -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/jameselliottdev.gpg Verify the GPG signing key you added is correct: sudo gpg --keyring /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/jameselliottdev.gpg --fingerprint 23139287 pub rsa4096 2021-01-06 [C] 3011 AD01 ACED 219F 5319 12D0 F901 891F 2313 9287 uid [ unknown] James Elliott sub rsa4096 2021-01-06 [S] [expires: 2024-01-06] sub rsa4096 2021-01-06 [E] [expires: 2024-01-06] sub rsa4096 2021-01-06 [A] [expires: 2024-01-06] Add the repository to APT’s sources.
